it.michelelacorte.swipeablecard

Interface Card

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OptionView.CreditCard, OptionView.MapsCard, OptionView.NormalCard

    public interface Card
    Interface to create a custom SwipeableCard, need to implements this with default method Created by Michele on 13/02/2016.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OptionView build()
      Public builder to set OptionView class with custom option.

      Color Title of Swipeable Card, default is BLACK.
